summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department, creating an Office of Professional Accountability to receive and investigate complaints of misconduct by Seattle Police Department personnel, adding a new Subchapter (VIII) to the Seattle Municipal Code, and contingently repealing Subchapter VII of SMC Chapter 3.28 including Sections 3.28.600, 3.28.610, 3.28.620, 3.28.630, 3.28.640, 3.28.650, and SMC 3.28.660.
